sources.title: Wild Weed (1949) Lila Leeds, Alan Baxter | Full Movie | Subtitles added!
sources.description:
A good girl, gone very bad!
A chorus girl's career is ruined and her brother is driven to suicide when she starts smoking marijuana.

Watch the colorized version: https://youtu.be/B8xt7oOaqmw

Original aka titles: The Devil's Weed / Marijuana, the Devil's Weed / She Should Have Said No

Director: Sam Newfield
Writers: Richard H. Landau, Arthur Hoerl
Stars: Lila Leeds, Alan Baxter, Lyle Talbot
Genre: Propaganda, Drama, Stoner Comedy.
